file_content.text: That's what I call an escape!
We're not alone. Sensors detect another vessel. SCORPIO's.
Our host doesn't want anyone leaving his party.
He thought of everything.
He's clingy that way.
He's the key to shutting it down. We have to find him.
We have to turn it off.
He found us.
Doesn't matter. I'm not leaving until you, ARIES, and Vaylin are dead.
I want to fight, not run.
How convenient we are all in this together.
Your struggles provide invaluable design feedback, but they do not change my decision. You are not worthy of inheriting Iokath. Soon, you will die.
You keep promising that, but we're still here. Think about giving up. It's not too late.
Back down, ARIES.
Your perception of time is distorted.
You've lost control--and we're coming for you.
We're only getting started.
The odds are against you.
Is there anything more to you than vague threats? I think your creators killed themselves out of embarrassment.
You're all talk, no action.
My creators were flawed beings, but they left a great legacy at my disposal.
The weapon I used to incapacitate you is re-energizing.
You abduct scores of people, then kill us for failing your test? You're a monster, ARIES.
You'll kill thousands!
I am a caretaker. This world's technology must not fall into the hands of barbaric beings.
If you could kill us with that technology, you would've done it by now.
I think you're bluffing.
The energy required to fuel the weapon takes time to harness. I began the process when Vaylin escaped her cell.
I'll destroy you, claim that weapon for myself, and conquer the galaxy with it.
That weapon should be mine.
The weapon is a part of this world. It cannot be separated. I appreciate your intentions, however.
If you have any affection for your remaining companions, I recommend using these final--
I have identified a design flaw in ARIES. He talks too much, and has revealed his location. We no longer require his input.
She's transmitting coordinates.
You will find ARIES there, along with his weapon and the energy shield controls.
Stopping ARIES is our top priority. Set a course, Theron.
Let's go.
I enjoy our collaborations.
What about you? I'm sure you'd like to see ARIES destroyed...
Do you plan to help?
You know me too well.
ARIES is all that stands between me and total control of this world. Consider what that will mean for you.
Soon, Iokath will be all mine.
Good hunting, Commander.
It's one scheme after another with her. Promise me she won't escape, that she'll pay for every betrayal.
SCORPIO doesn't have to die, but she'll answer for all her crimes.
I'll bring her to justice.
Make sure the punishment fits.
SCORPIO wants Iokath to herself. She might stay here forever.
Escape is not her plan.
Sooner or later, she'll want to leave. You need to stop her... permanently.
I'll make certain she never interferes with my plans again.
She's as good as dead.
That's all I ask.
The shuttle won't last here. I've got coordinates to the Gravestone. Be right back!
Is it following us?
It's leaving.
What was that?
There's a massive energy shield surrounding Iokath. Nothing can pass through it.
The energy wave that knocked us unconscious. We have no defense against it.
When it fires this time, you will not wake up.
I heard everything. Don't let that no good, double-crossing droid get off easy.
You're one to talk. You're as much a traitor as SCORPIO is.
You're just as bad as her.
The difference is, I double-crossed you for good reasons.
She's the reason we're in this mess, and she's playing us. We're gonna melt her down before we leave, right?
Before you go any farther, observe.
ARIES controls the shield.
